member.name: T:LoveSeat.CouchClient
member.summary: Used as the starting point for any communication with CouchDB

member.name: M:LoveSeat.CouchClient.#ctor
member.summary: This is only intended for use if your CouchDb is in Admin Party

member.name: M:LoveSeat.CouchClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: CouchClient constructor

members.member:
Constructs the CouchClient and gets an authentication cookie (10 min)
The hostname of the CouchDB instance The port of the CouchDB instance The username of the CouchDB instanceCou The password of the CouchDB instance

member.name: M:LoveSeat.CouchClient.#ctor(LoveSeat.CouchConfiguration)
member.summary: CouchClient constructor

member.name: M:LoveSeat.CouchClient.TriggerReplication(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Triggers one way replication from the source to target. If bidirection is needed call this method twice with the source and target args reversed.
member.param: Uri or database name of database to replicate from
Uri or database name of database to replicate to
Whether or not CouchDB should continue to replicate going forward on it's own

member.summary: Deletes the specified database

member.summary: Creates an admin user

member.summary: Deletes admin user (if you have permission)

member.summary: Returns a bool indicating whether or not the database exists.

member.summary: Get's the user.

member.name: M:LoveSeat.HashIt.ComputeHash(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Computes SHA1 hash for plain text and returns a base64-encoded result. Before the hash is computed, a random salt of 25 characters. is generated and appended to the plain text. The salt is passed by reference.

member.name: M:LoveSeat.HashIt.RandomString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Build random string

member.name: M:LoveSeat.HashIt.ByteArrayToString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Convert ByteArray to String

member.name: M:LoveSeat.Interfaces.IDocumentDatabase.CreateDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a document using the json provided. No validation or smarts attempted here by design for simplicities sake
member.returns: The status from CouchDb as a JObject

member.name: M:LoveSeat.Interfaces.IDocumentDatabase.CreateDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a document when you intend for Couch to generate the id for you.
member.returns: Returns the status from Couchdb as a JObject

member.name: M:LoveSeat.Interfaces.IDocumentDatabase.GetDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Returns null if document is not found

member.name: M:LoveSeat.Interfaces.IDocumentDatabase.AddAttachment(System.String,System.Byte[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an attachment to a document. If revision is not specified then the most recent will be fetched and used. Warning: if you need document update conflicts to occur please use the method that specifies the revision
member.param: byte[] of of the attachment. Use File.ReadAllBytes()

member.name: M:LoveSeat.Interfaces.IDocumentDatabase.AddAttachment(System.String,System.String,System.Byte[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an attachment to the documnet. Rev must be specified on this signature. If you want to attach no matter what then use the method without the rev param
member.param: byte[] of of the attachment. Use File.ReadAllBytes()

member.name: M:LoveSeat.Interfaces.IDocumentDatabase.View``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the results of a view with no view parameters. Use the overload to pass parameters
member.param: The design doc on which the view resides

member.name: M:LoveSeat.Interfaces.IDocumentDatabase.View``1(System.String,LoveSeat.ViewOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the results of the view using any and all parameters
member.param: The design doc on which the view resides

member.summary: Gets all the documents in the database using the _all_docs uri

member.summary: Gets the results of the view using the defaultDesignDoc and no view parameters. Use the overloads to specify options.

member.summary: Allows you to specify options and uses the defaultDesignDoc Specified.

member.summary: Request multiple documents in a single request.

member.name: M:LoveSeat.CouchDatabase.SaveDocuments(LoveSeat.Documents,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Using the bulk API for the loading of documents.
member.remarks: Here we assume you have either added the correct rev, id, or _deleted attribute to each document. The response will indicate if there were any errors. Please note that the max_document_size configuration variable in CouchDB limits the maximum request size to CouchDB.
member.returns: JSON of updated documents in the BulkDocumentResponse class.

member.name: M:LoveSeat.CouchDatabase.AddAttachment(System.String,System.Byte[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an attachment to a document. If revision is not specified then the most recent will be fetched and used. Warning: if you need document update conflicts to occur please use the method that specifies the revision
member.param: byte[] of of the attachment. Use File.ReadAllBytes()

member.summary: Adds an attachment to the documnet. Rev must be specified on this signature. If you want to attach no matter what then use the method without the rev param
member.param: byte[] of of the attachment. Use File.ReadAllBytes()
